title: Select a Launch Provider
description: A satellite program manager needs to select a launch provider to get their new satellite into orbit.

tasks.description: Define the satellite's requirements for launch, including its mass, volume, and target orbit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all key launch requirements.

tasks.description: Analyze the capabilities, cost, and reliability of available launch providers (e.g., SpaceX, Arianespace, ULA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a trade study comparing the different providers.

tasks.description: Select the best-value provider and begin contract negotiations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a data-driven recommendation and initiates the procurement process.
